title: Test Financial System Disaster Recovery Plan
description: A risk officer is conducting a test of the disaster recovery (DR) plan for the primary accounting system.

tasks.description: Initiate the failover process to switch from the primary system to the DR system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent executes the command to switch to the backup data center.

tasks.description: Verify that the DR system is online and that data is consistent with the primary system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs a data integrity check and confirms the DR system is functioning correctly.

tasks.description: Log the results of the DR test, including the time taken for failover.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent documents a successful DR test with a failover time of 15 minutes.
